thread.title: Kendrick Lamar To Barack Obama: "We Really Gonna Miss You Champ"
thread.title_full: Kendrick Lamar To Barack Obama: "We Really Gonna Miss You Champ"

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Kendrick Lamar To Barack Obama: "We Really Gonna Miss You Champ"
text:
Home > Music > Kendrick Lamar To Barack Obama: "We Really Gonna Miss You Champ" Kendrick Lamar To Barack Obama: "We Really Gonna Miss You Champ" 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz   Kendrick says goodbye to President Obama. 
Hours before Barack Obama handed the presidential torch to Donald Trump, Kendrick Lamar shared a message for Barry O on Twitter. 
"We really gonna miss you champ," he tweeted at @POTUS. "The good you've done & opportunity's you've given. Truly never know what we got til its gone. Thank u." 
Kendrick and Barack are old pals: Kendrick visited the White House to help out with his "My Brother's Keeper" initiative. Obama is on the record picking Kendrick over Drake and named "How Much a Dollar Cost" his favorite song of 2015 . Kendrick challenged him to a game of basketball not to long ago. Now that Barack is a president-emeritus, maybe they call finally ball. @potus We really gonna miss you champ. The good you've done & opportunity's you've given. Truly never know what we got til its gone. Thank u   153 Views
